```{r}
txt <- read.table(file='1.txt', header=TRUE, sep = '\t', stringsAsFactors = FALSE) # Strings
cls <- read.table(file = '2.txt', header = TRUE, sep = '\t') # Ordinal Factor
cls <- factor(cls, order = TRUE, levels=c('Freshman', 'Sophomore', 'Junior', 'Senior'))
major <- read.table(file='3.txt', header=TRUE, sep = '\t') # Factor
by <- read.table(file='4.txt', header=TRUE, sep = '\t') # Numeric only because you can do computations with birth years
data.frame(txt,cls,major,by)
```
